Detailed Description

Author:
Mark Hoemmen
Since:
26 May 2005
Date:
Time-stamp: <2008-07-16 11:25:08 mhoemmen>
Load and save operations on general sparse matrices.

Function Documentation

struct sparse_matrix_t* load_sparse_matrix ( enum sparse_matrix_file_format_t  file_format,
const char *const   matrix_filename 
)

Loads a sparse matrix from the given file, with the assumption that the file is in the format file_format.

Parameters:
file_format [IN] Input file format
matrix_filename [IN] Name of the file from which to load the matrix
Returns:
If no error, the sparse matrix; else NULL.

int print_sparse_matrix ( FILE *  out,
struct sparse_matrix_t *  A 
)

Prints the given sparse matrix to out in Matrix Market format.

FIXME: should allow any valid output format!

int save_sparse_matrix ( const char *const   filename,
struct sparse_matrix_t *  A,
enum sparse_matrix_file_format_t  file_format 
)

Saves the sparse matrix A to the given file, using the given file format.

Parameters:
filename [IN] Name of the file to which to save the matrix
A [IN] The matrix to save
file_format [IN] Output file format

int sparse_matrix_convert ( struct sparse_matrix_t *  A,
enum sparse_matrix_storage_format_t  output_format 
)

Converts the sparse matrix A from its current format into the new format output_format.

Parameters:
A [IN/OUT] Sparse matrix to convert
output_format [IN] New storage format
Returns:
Zero if successful, else nonzero.

int sparse_matrix_expand_symmetric_storage ( struct sparse_matrix_t *  A  ) 

If A is stored in a space-saving symmetric format, expands A in place so that all the nonzero elements are stored explicitly.

Parameters:
A [IN/OUT] Pointer to sparse matrix object
Returns:
Zero if successful, else nonzero.

enum sparse_matrix_file_format_t sparse_matrix_file_format_string_to_enum ( const char *const   s  ) 

Given a string, returns the corresponding sparse matrix file format enum.

enum sparse_matrix_storage_format_t sparse_matrix_storage_format_string_to_enum ( const char *const   s  ) 

Given a string, returns the corresponding sparse matrix (internal) storage format enum.

int valid_sparse_matrix ( struct sparse_matrix_t *  A  ) 

Returns 0 if the given sparse matrix has a valid representation, else returns nonzero.
